name: Marketplace is available when “Enable Marketplace” is set to true

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Marketplace is available when “Enable Marketplace” is set to true
————————————————————————————
1. Go to main menu > System Console > PLUGINS > Plugin Management.
2. Set “Enable Marketplace” to true and hit the “Save” button at the bottom.
3. Switch to a Mattermost team.
4. Click on the product switcher icon (top left) to open menu.
inline.expectedResult: “Marketplace” is available in the main menu

customFields.Important notes about this step: This test is to verify the UI component in the System Console's "Plugin Management" page instead of changing the plugin settings through the server config file.
